com.plexobject.dp.metrics

Class Metric

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.plexobject.dp.metrics.Metric

  • public class Metric
extends java.lang.Object
    This class maintains profiling metrics. This is thread safe class.

      • newTimer

        public static Timer newTimer(java.lang.String name)
        This method finds metric and creates a new timer for it. The caller must call lapse or stop to add the results back to the metric.
        Parameters:
        name - - name of metric
        Returns:
        Timer instance
